page.title: 18MR. THOMAS IS A PENSIONER...
page.content: Mr.Thomas is a pensioner.He lives with his wife in a semi-detatched house in Roud.He was born in Lambeth, London and he came to the Island 30 years ago in 1955.He has lived in his present house for 29 years. Mr.Thomas says,"...there has been no major changes in Roud and Chale Green execpt for the new estate in Chale Green." He also determines that although there are no special facilities,Roud is a lovely area for a child to grow up in because of the beautiful countryside. When we asked Mr.Thomas whether he believed in conservation,he replied,"Well,most of the time I do,but not always."
